name: Alex C303 27in. 36H Rear Wheel - Unisex
description: Good value in a 27 inch wheel. This wheel is suitable for entry level MTB and urban bikes with rim brakes.Single-walled aluminum rims with stainless steel spokes.Compatible with clincher tires with Shraeder valves.36 hole hub fits 8/9 speed cassette with 135mm spacing.Quick release skewer included.Internal rim width: 20.7mm.Rim height: 15mm.
